pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, April 5, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, April 5, 2016:

Reminder - Due to severe weather conditions in Newfoundland and Labrador, the Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Corner Brook, N.L. for Tuesday April 5, 2016 has been cancelled.

Ottawa

The Prime Minister will be in private meetings.
